msg: Revised to fix problem with local path/file being prepended
with file:////. This may be temporary.
Also, added the -d option to specify a directory for the compiled
translets. This may need to be done better by passing in the
directory from the conf.props file. For now the simple scheme of
putting the compiled translets in a directory named "translets"
under the "tests" directory should suffice to at least run the
